title: 【新版本】【Beta Pleased Giraffe】 151216 稳定版
author: 王奕磊WYL
txt_content:
本帖最后由 王奕磊WYL 于 2016-2-3 10:52 编辑 



151216 稳定版：http://pan.baidu.com/share/init?shareid=3349732584&uk=3140767687
密码：4y5p

更新简要：

1.【武器】






a8fb6e05b193735c.gif (204.67 KB, 下载次数: 49)

下载附件

2016-2-2 08:30 上传






Generated and tiered two-handed weapons now have special abilities that can be activated using right click. Many (45+) possible abilities are available for various classes of ranged and melee weapons!
随机双手武器和各等级制造的双手武器现在能够通过右键使用特殊技能。各种类别的近战和远程武器现在共拥有45个以上的特殊技能。

Yes, some guns now have flashlights
是的，一些枪支现在有手电筒了

Change to hammer mechanics: hold left click to wind up, release to fire
更改了锤类武器的攻击方式：按住左键蓄力，松开攻击

Change to spear mechanics: continue holding left click after a swing to keep the spear out to fend off enemies
更改了矛类武器的攻击方式：在左键攻击后按住不动可以保持长矛刺出来抵御敌人

Several new classes of hard-to-find unique weapons: boomerangs, chakrams and fist weapons
增加了几种稀有的特殊武器：飞去来器（回旋镖），环刃和拳套

Find blueprints to upgrade these weapons into even more powerful and specialized versions at higher tiers
寻找蓝图来升级这些武器使其变得更加强大和独特

Dual wield fist weapons to enable powerful combo finishers
双持拳套来解锁强力组合终结技

A few miscellaneous unique weapons and items such as flamethrowers and remote-detonated grenade launchers
添加了少量特殊武器如火焰喷射器和榴弹发射器

2.【怪物和npc的战斗方式】






459348d9f5f65f4d.gif (70.66 KB, 下载次数: 43)

下载附件

2016-2-2 08:29 上传






Lots of new unique monsters found throughout the galaxy, each with their own special abilities and behaviors
宇宙中能找到更多特殊怪物啦

Knockback is more powerful and reliable
击退现在更加强力和可靠了

Monsters have clearer ‘telegraphing’ to indicate when they are about to attack
在攻击前，怪物会明确释放“我要来干你啦”的信号

Remade shields and improved blocking mechanics
重做了盾牌以及改良了格挡机制

Replaced electric stun status effect with Electrified, which periodically damages other nearby enemies
用电气场来取代了被电晕的攻击效果，现在电属性攻击会产生周期性伤害周围敌人的效果

Hostile monsters now damage the player on touch
敌对怪物现在能通过触碰就对玩家造成伤害

3.【载具】



New system for player-controlled vehicleswhich can be spawned and despawned using Vehicle Controllers (acquired at theOutpost)可以召唤和收回的新载具系统，玩家可以从前哨站获得载具控制器来使用这个系统
Hoverbikes!悬浮摩托！
Great for travelling across planet surfacesquickly!帮助你在星球表面快速移动
They include a passenger seat so you cantransport your friends!包含乘客座位方便你带着你的好友去兜风
Come in several attractive colors!多个颜色可选择
Drive carefully to avoid blowing yourselfup!小心驾驶别把自己炸出去
Boats!船！
Similar to the previous boat tech, usefulfor crossing large bodies of water和以前的船只科技相似，帮助你穿越大面积的水域
Your friends can ride on deck or posedramatically in the bow你的朋友们可以站在甲板上或者招摇地站在船头
Visit Rob Repairo in the Outpost shipyardarea to repair your vehicles using auto chips, which can be found in the worldor purchased at the Outpost在前哨站的船坞区域可以找到Rob Repairo，在他那儿使用自动芯片来修理载具，自动芯片可以在宇宙中获得，也能在前哨站买到。
4.【任务】





540667990c4b9d13.gif (64.33 KB, 下载次数: 38)

下载附件

2016-2-2 08:43 上传






Quest givers’ portraits are shown on questdialogs and in the log发布任务的人的造型会出现在任务对话和日志中
Colonists now occasionally give players newprocedural quests to help improve their house or social standing殖民地居民偶尔会发布任务给玩家，来提高他们的房子质量或社会地位
The abandon button can be used onprocedural quests and the same quests can now be declined现在放弃按钮可以用于随机产生的任务，重复的任务现在可以拒绝
5.【生态】

New ‘Midnight’ planets新的“永夜”星球
New ‘Frozen’ planets (replaces Tundra)“冻土”星球取代了“苔原”星球
Prism, Steam Spring, and Hive sub biomes增加了棱光，蒸汽，蜂巢生态
Over 300 new microdungeons and otherimprovements to all underground biomes, including background caves andparallaxes300多个的新的迷你地下城和地下迷你生态的改进，包括背景洞穴和视差变化
6.【其他】





9ca0e83448280ae6.gif (70.76 KB, 下载次数: 40)

下载附件

2016-2-2 08:47 上传






Craftable elevator objects, because stairsare so last millennium可以制造电梯了，因为我们已经用了一千年的楼梯了
Consumable dyes to change the color ofarmor and clothing增加了可以改变盔甲和衣服颜色的染料（消耗品）
Capture pods are (for now) used to captureand relocate critters, with a more complete pet system returning in a futurepatch捕捉仓现在用来捕捉和重新放出小动物，在未来的补丁中，将带来更完善的宠物系统
Loads of item descriptions have beenfixed/replaced/added, including lots of Novakid ones!大量的物品描述被修复、取代、添加，包括星之子视角的描述
Too many new objects, items, costumes,colony tenants, etc. to list多到难以列举的新项目、新物品、新时装和新的房客（殖民地居民）
Too many bug fixes, item tweaks, andbalance changes to list多到难以列举的bug修复、物品调整和平衡性变化
Improved support for Tiled map and tilesetformat for modders为modder们改善了Tiled地图编辑器和地形设置格式的支持

【已知问题】
Some one-handed, unique and biome weaponswhich still use the old system will be replaced in a future patch一些单手武器、特殊武器和生态武器仍然在使用旧的武器系统，它们将在下一个补丁中被取代

感谢翻译者：小七
